name.description: A descriptive name of a dataset

description.description: A short summary describing a dataset

url.description: Location of a page describing the dataset

sameAs.description: Other URLs that can be used to access the dataset page

version.description: The version number for this dataset

license.description: A license under which the dataset is distributed

includedInDataCatalog.description: The catalog to which this dataset belongs to

distribution.description: A downloadable form of this dataset, at a specific location, in a specific format

distribution.fileFormat.description: The file format of this distribution

citation.description: A citation for a publication that describes the dataset
